const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "shapes",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      geometry: {
        type: "shape",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "shapes",
  id: "footprint",
  document: {
    geometry: {
      type: "envelope",
      coordinates: [
        [1355, 5355],
        [1400, 5200],
      ],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: "example",
  query: {
    shape: {
      geometry: {
        indexed_shape: {
          index: "shapes",
          id: "footprint",
          path: "geometry",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response2);
